title: Constructivist-Based Collaborative Technology Education Instructional Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Understanding of High School Curriculum and General Instructional Design Theories
context.additional_context: Exploration of methods for applying constructivist and cooperative learning strategies to technology education lesson design by pre-service teachers.

learning_goals: Learners can design a virtual reality-based collaborative learning scenario on the history of agricultural technology development.
Learners can develop instructional materials for technology education that reflect a multidisciplinary approach (history, geography, environment, etc.).
Learners can monitor collaborative learning processes and propose improvements using formative assessment tools.
Learners can demonstrate how to operate virtual reality and hypermedia-based learning activities in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
